blogPost.excerpt: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.
blogPost.body: Partnerbow makes it simple to request and negotiate price quotes from multiple partners, approve or reject proposed hours and pricing, track payments as well as keep an up-to-date catalogue of all your partner agencies and freelancers.
blogPost.title: Partnerbow - Easy way to request, negotiate and approve price estimates.
blogPost.author: Taavi Raidma

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以让您简单地请求和协商多个合作伙伴的报价，批准或拒绝建议的工时和定价，跟踪付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴机构和自由职业者的最新目录。
localize.tagline: 简单的方法来申请、谈判和批准价格估算。

localize.description: Partnerbow 可以讓您簡單地請求和協商多個合作伙伴的報價，批准或拒絕建議的工時和定價，跟蹤付款，以及保持您所有合作伙伴機構和自由職業者的最新目錄。
localize.tagline: 簡單的方法來申請、談判和批准價格估算。

previous.excerpt: ABtesting.ai uses Artificial Intelligence to create, combine and test different variations of headlines, copies, calls to action and Images, to find the best fit for your audience, increasing conversions and reducing costs.
previous.title: ABtesting.ai - Skyrocket your conversion rates on autopilot (using GPT-3)

localize.description: ABtesting.ai使用人工智能来创建、组合和测试不同的标题、副本、行动呼吁和图像的变化，以找到最适合您的受众，提高转换率并降低成本。
localize.tagline: 在自动驾驶仪上大幅提升您的转换率（使用GPT-3）。

localize.description: ABtesting.ai使用人工智能來創建、組合和測試不同的標題、副本、行動呼籲和圖像的變化，以找到最適合您的受衆，提高轉換率並降低成本。
localize.tagline: 在自動駕駛儀上大幅提升您的轉換率（使用GPT-3）。

next.excerpt: Accurately measure how well your product is satisfying the needs of the modern market + your core power user at every stage of your product lifecycle.
next.title: Free Product/Market Fit Survey.com - A Free tool to help you build products people want and love

localize.description: 准确衡量你的产品在产品生命周期的每个阶段满足现代市场+你的核心力量用户的需求的程度。
localize.tagline: 一个免费的工具，帮助你打造人们想要和喜爱的产品。

localize.description: 準確衡量你的產品在產品生命週期的每個階段滿足現代市場+你的核心力量用戶的需求的程度。
localize.tagline: 一個免費的工具，幫助你打造人們想要和喜愛的產品。
